item.name: X13 Set Global Design Settings and Activate Global Credentials
X13 Get Global IP Pool ID
X 13 Add Border1 + Infra + 1/0/2 to Fabric
X13 Get Device Info - Border 1 in Fabric
X13 Add Border2 + Infra + 1/0/2 to Fabric
X13 Get Device Info - Border 1 and 2 in Fabric

body.raw:
{
    "name": "Infra_Border1",
    "description": "Configuration for Border 1 Infra",
    "tags": [],
    "deviceTypes": [
        {
            "productFamily": "Switches and Hubs"
        }
    ],
    "softwareType": "IOS-XE",
    "softwareVariant": "XE",
    "templateContent": "int vlan 3001\nbfd interval 300 min_rx 300 multiplier 3\nno bfd echo\nrouter bgp 65534\nneighbor 100.124.0.2 remote-as 65534\nneighbor 100.124.0.2 update-source Loopback0\nneighbor 100.124.0.2 fall-over bfd\naddress-family ipv4\nneighbor 100.124.0.2 activate\nneighbor 100.124.0.2 next-hop-self\nredistribute isis level-2 metric 10 route-map isis-into-bgp\nneighbor 100.126.1.2 fall-over bfd\nrouter isis\nredistribute bgp 65534 metric 100 metric-type external\nip access-list standard isis-into-bgp\npermit 100.124.1.0 0.0.0.255\nroute-map isis-into-bgp per 10\nmatch ip address isis-into-bgp\n",
    
    "rollbackTemplateContent": "",
    "templateParams": [],
    "composite": false,
    "projectName": "POV_Automation",
    "projectId": "{{prjPovAutomation}}"
}

{
    "name": "Infra_Border2",
    "description": "Configuration for Border 2 Infra",
    "tags": [],
    "deviceTypes": [
        {
            "productFamily": "Switches and Hubs"
        }
    ],
    "softwareType": "IOS-XE",
    "softwareVariant": "XE",
    "templateContent": "int vlan 3002
bfd interval 300 min_rx 300 multiplier 3
no bfd echo
router bgp 65534
neighbor 100.124.0.1 remote-as 65534
neighbor 100.124.0.1 update-source Loopback0
neighbor 100.124.0.1 fall-over bfd

address-family ipv4
neighbor 100.124.0.1 activate
neighbor 100.124.0.1 next-hop-self
neighbor 100.126.1.6 fall-over bfd
redistribute isis level-2 metric 10 route-map isis-into-bgp

router isis
redistribute bgp 65534 metric 100 metric-type external

ip access-list standard isis-into-bgp
permit 100.124.1.0 0.0.0.255

route-map isis-into-bgp per 10
match ip address isis-into-bgp
",
    
    "rollbackTemplateContent": "",
    "templateParams": [],
    "composite": false,
    "projectName": "POV_Automation",
    "projectId": "{{prjPovAutomation}}"
}

item.name: X13 Get HR, ACCT, Employees, CQ SGT IDs
X13 Create Campus VN with SGTs
X13 Get Campus Pool Reservation ID
X Set Default Authentication Profile to Closed
X Bind IP Pool to Campus VN
Get Device Info - Border 1 and 2 in Fabric
X Add Border1 + Campus + 1/0/2 to Fabric
Get Device Info - Border 1 and 2 in Fabric
X Add Border2 + Campus + 1/0/2 to Fabric
6.1 Deploy Campus - Border 1 Switch Config (IN PROGRESS)

body.raw:
{
    "name": "Campus_Border1",
    "description": "Configuration for Border 1 Campus",
    "tags": [],
    "deviceTypes": [
        {
            "productFamily": "Switches and Hubs"
        }
    ],
    "softwareType": "IOS-XE",
    "softwareVariant": "XE",
    "templateContent": "int vlan 3003\nbfd interval 300 min_rx 300 multiplier 3\nno bfd echo\nint vlan 41\nvrf forward Campus\nip address 100.126.0.133 255.255.255.252\nbfd interval 300 min_rx 300 multiplier 3\nno bfd echo\ndescription L3 Border 2 Border iBGP link in Campus VN\nrouter bgp 65534\naddress-family ipv4 vrf Campus\nneighbor 100.126.0.134 remote-as 65534\nneighbor 100.126.0.134 fall-over bfd\nneighbor 100.126.0.134 activate\nneighbor 100.126.1.10 fall-over bfd\n",
    
    "rollbackTemplateContent": "",
    "templateParams": [],
    "composite": false,
    "projectName": "POV_Automation",
    "projectId": "{{prjPovAutomation}}"
}
